entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 Preview 5: Android Release builds no longer work #32539

Closed

  • $(TargetVersionFramework) is empty when using <TargetVersionFrameworks> #32536

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32541
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Enable documentation files in GenAPI & APICompat #32530
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Create README.md for CTLs #32529
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #32517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update to 7.0.304 #32537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for optional workload EOL #32426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try installing wasm-tools from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink
  • [release/7.0.4xx] corrected strings in containers #32456
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #32447
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove Cli integration tests which are migrated to dotnet/templating #32477
    untriaged

Updated

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Support side by side workload manifests in SDK resolver #32471
    untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] removed restriction on Publish SDK to allow publishing non-web project #32422
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Default all containers to linux instead of the current SDK's OS #32473
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.3xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32375
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
